title: Calories in Gelato
meta_description: Discover calories in gelato per 100g serving, including carbs, fat, protein, and nutrition tweaks for different flavors and preparations.
assumptions: Standard vanilla gelato, churned with milk, cream, and sugar; no mix-ins; approximate average values.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand, fat content, and serving size. Check labels for precise info.

quick_answer.text: 100g of gelato provides about 215 kcal, with 11g fat and 25g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g of gelato?
faqs.a: Approximately 215 kcal for standard vanilla gelato.

faqs.q: Is gelato lower in calories than ice cream?
faqs.a: Often yes, due to less air and fat; gelato averages 200-220 kcal per 100g vs. 220-250 for ice cream.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in gelato?
faqs.a: About 25g per 100g, mostly from sugars like lactose and added sweeteners.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in gelato?
faqs.a: Fruit flavors are lower (~180 kcal/100g); nut or chocolate varieties higher (~240 kcal/100g).

faqs.q: What's the protein content in gelato?
faqs.a: Around 4g per 100g, mainly from milk proteins.
